attributes.action: Action as gross misconduct and dismiss MP’s acting against the referendum
attributes.background: MP’s are employed by the public, we have had a referendum and it was decided to leave the EU. 17.4 million people have voted this way. Certain MP’s have gone against this result and have chosen to try and block Brexit any way they can. We ask they be dismissed and their pensions removed

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for people to lose their jobs.

You might like to sign a petition about the UK leaving the European Union, for example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
